comments:
In perspective code I create a number of views as fastviews...ie

        layout.addFastView(IPageLayout.ID_OUTLINE);

When you launch this perspective, if the view has never been "opened" 
or "clicked to show" dragging the fastview icon onto a area to doc will give an 
exception. If you open the view before doing this it works fine. Below is the 
exception.


java.lang.NullPointerException
